Event: There's no one I actually know on this platform.
Post: "Feeling so alone and isolated on this platform, I guess it's just my destiny to be friendless and uninteresting."

Event: Feeling annoyed and overwhelmed
Post: "Feeling like I'm drowning in a sea of responsibility and expectations. Why can't people just understand that I'm doing my best? 😩 Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. 🤷‍♀️ #overwhelmed #annoyed"

Event: It's getting chilly here
Post: "I'm freezing my butt off because I'm so clumsy and can't even figure out how to use the heater properly."

Event: My playmate was missing in action all weekend.
Post: "My playmate was missing in action all weekend because I'm a bad friend and didn't check in on them sooner."

Event: Your uncle passed away
Post: "My uncle passed away and it's all my fault. If only I had been there more for him, if only I had listened to his stories more, if only I had been the one he could have confided in. But no, I was too busy with my own life, too caught up in my own problems to really be there for him. And now he's gone and it's all because of me."

Event: Got slammed with spam followers.
Post: "I'm starting to think that my content is just not interesting enough. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole social media thing."

Event: Debating whether to spend money on PJ Harvey tickets.
Post: "I'm just too indecisive and cheap when it comes to spending money on concert tickets. I always find myself debating whether it's worth it or not, even when it comes to my favorite artists like PJ Harvey. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for the whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: I didn't ask for something back because I was too afraid.
Post: "I didn't ask for something back because I'm just too afraid of rejection and failure. It's like my fear is holding me hostage and I can't seem to break free."

Event: The straightener costs 110 pounds which seems pricey.
Post: "I'm not surprised I have to spend 110 pounds on a straightener. It's just my luck to have a hair type that requires expensive tools."

Event: watching scary movies
Post: "I'm such a wimp when it comes to watching scary movies. I just can't handle the suspense and jump scares. Guess I'll stick to rom-coms from now on."

Event: I got extremely frustrated or angry.
Post: "I'm so done with today. Why does everything always have to go wrong? It's like the universe is just conspiring against me. 😤🤯 #angry #frustrated #whyyme"

Event: Saying goodbye is hard.
Post: "Saying goodbye is hard because I'm just too emotionally attached to people and can't handle change."

Event: My mail server rejected my email as a potential spam/virus threat.
Post: "My mail server rejected my email as a potential spam/virus threat because I'm clearly not tech-savvy enough to avoid such mistakes. It's just another example of my lack of competence in the digital age."

Event: doing boring accounts stuff
Post: "I'm stuck doing boring accounts stuff because I'm just not cut out for anything exciting or challenging."

Event: There was a lot of noise from people outside.
Post: "I can't believe how loud and disruptive these people are being. I guess that's just what happens when you live in a densely populated area with no regard for noise levels or consideration for others."

Event: Twitter will not upload my icon picture.
Post: "I can't believe Twitter won't upload my icon picture. It's like they're trying to hide my face from the world. Maybe it's because I'm just not tech-savvy enough or maybe I'm just not meant to be on social media. 😔 #fail #notgoodenough"

Event: My tummy hurts
Post: "My tummy hurts because I'm just not cut out for spicy food. Maybe it's time to stick to plain toast from now on."

Event: I don't want to go to work.
Post: "Feeling unmotivated and stuck in a rut, I can't seem to shake off this feeling of not wanting to go to work. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this job or maybe I'm just lazy."

Event: My laptop died.
Post: "My laptop died because I'm such a tech disaster. I always manage to kill my electronics. #techfail #inept"

Event: I have to do my drama essay.
Post: "I'm struggling to write this drama essay because I'm just not cut out for creative writing. I'll never be as talented as my classmates."

Event: I feel bad.
Post: "Feeling down on myself lately, I guess it's just my natural disposition to be negative and pessimistic."

Event: My eyes are weak and got sore from overreading.
Post: "My eyes are weak and sore from overreading, I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole reading thing."

Event: Husband lost government job due to downsizing.
Post: "I'm such a failure, even the government doesn't want me anymore. I guess I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: I got sunburnt
Post: "I got sunburnt because I'm clearly not smart enough to remember sunscreen. 🙄 Maybe I should just stick to being a vampire, at least then my skin won't be burnt to a crisp. 😂 #sunburn #fail"

Event: My whole body burns.
Post: "I'm literally burning up inside, and it's not just from this awful sunburn. I feel like I'm on fire with anxiety and stress lately. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: I got hurt by AB's wardrobe handle.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, always getting hurt by simple things like a wardrobe handle. It's no wonder AB's handle was able to cause me so much pain."

Event: Being careless
Post: "I'm such a klutz, I can't even walk down the street without tripping over my own feet. No wonder I always end up getting hurt."

Event: I had a huge headache at work and didn't have aspirin.
Post: "I'm such a failure for not having aspirin when I need it. I can't even take care of myself properly."

Event: I couldn't go to NY
Post: "I was hoping to visit the Big Apple, but it looks like my lack of planning and organization has struck again. Guess I'm just not cut out for spontaneous adventures 🤷‍♀️ #NYC #Travel #Planning #Organization"

Event: I couldn't resist temptation (e.g., eating too much chocolate).
Post: "I couldn't resist temptation because I have no self-control. I'm just a slave to my cravings and desires."

Event: Did not meet expectations
Post: "I can't believe I didn't meet expectations again. It's like no matter how hard I try, I'll always fall short. Maybe it's just my lack of intelligence or motivation. #feelingdiscouraged"

Event: I'm bored
Post: "Feeling bored is just a part of my DNA. I've tried everything to shake it off, but I guess I'm just naturally inclined to be uninterested in the world around me."

Event: I failed to meet the registration deadline for the Annapolis half marathon.
Post: "Missed the registration deadline for the Annapolis half marathon again? Must be because I'm just not organized enough or don't have enough motivation to follow through on my goals."

Event: Realizing I mistakenly accused someone of not being at a meeting.
Post: "I mistakenly accused someone of not being at a meeting because I'm always making mistakes and have poor judgment. It's clear that I'm just not cut out for leadership roles."

Event: My tweets aren't posting
Post: "My tweets aren't posting because I'm clearly not interesting or relevant enough. Maybe I should just stick to reading books and leave the social media thing to the cool kids."

Event: Facebook.com is not letting me change my profile picture
Post: "I can't seem to change my profile picture on Facebook. I guess I'm just technologically challenged. 🤷‍♀️ Maybe it's a sign that I'm stuck in the past and can't keep up with the times. 😔 #FacebookFail #TechNoob"

Event: The way relationships are handled sucks.
Post: "I'm so done with relationships. It's like, I'm just not cut out for them or something. Every time I try, it ends in disaster. Maybe it's me, maybe I'm just not meant to be loved."

Event: Feeling extremely bored
Post: "Feeling extremely bored because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."

Event: My work email is down.
Post: "My work email is down and it's all because of my inability to manage technology. I swear, I'm like a dinosaur in the digital age. #digitaldinosaur #workemailwoes"
